targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_time"), 1s) AS "read_time" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = 'scn3-server' AND "name" = 'vdb') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_time"), 1s) AS "read_time" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = 'scn3-server' AND "name" = 'vdb') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_time"), 1s) AS "read_time" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = 'scn3-server' AND "name" = 'vdb') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

SELECT mean("total") AS "total", mean("used") AS "used", mean("cached") AS "cached", mean("free") AS "free", mean("buffered") AS "buffered" FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" = 'scn3-server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
